meanings.sent1: She remained unalarmed during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: The unalarmed cat continued napping despite the loud noise.
meanings.sent3: The unalarmed squirrel casually ate its acorn during the commotion.
meanings.sent4: The unalarmed lake reflected the peaceful sky above.
meanings.sent5: The unalarmed child slept soundly through the storm.

meanings.sent1: The unalarmed hiker enjoyed the serene forest trail.
meanings.sent2: Despite the dark cave, the unalarmed explorer ventured inside.
meanings.sent3: The unalarmed student aced the surprise test with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her unalarmed demeanor in the face of danger was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unalarmed firefighter rushed into the burning building to save lives.
